devdoc.details: This implements chianlink VRF2 and chainlink automation

checkUpkeep(bytes).details: this is function that the chainlink keeper nodes call they look for `upkeepNeeded` to return true Following should be true in order to return true 1. Our time interval should have passed 2. The lottery should have at least 1 player , and have some ETH 3. Subscription is funded with LINK 4. Lottery should be in an "open" state (create some state variable that will tell us wheather a lottery is open or not)

devdoc.title: A sample Raffle Contrcat

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.
